definition: The term refers to the overall impression and satisfaction that individuals have when interacting with a product, system, or service. It encompasses various aspects such as ease of use, efficiency, and enjoyment. It is commonly used in the context of evaluating and improving the usability and user-friendliness of digital interfaces, websites, and software applications.

examples.german: Die Benutzererfahrung dieser App ist sehr gut.
examples.english: The user experience of this app is very good.

examples.german: Benutzererfahrung ist ein wichtiger Faktor bei der Gestaltung von Websites.
examples.english: User experience is an important factor in website design.

examples.english: User experience can be enhanced through an intuitive user interface.
